Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.jasper

[Groovy] Class JasperService

    • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.jasper.JasperService

    • Generates Jasper reports. Call one of the three generateReport methods to get a ByteArrayOutputStream with the generated report.

      Authors:
      Sebastian Hohns

      • Method Detail

        • private void applyCustomParameters(java.lang.reflect.Field[] fields, net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRExporter exporter, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> parameters)

          Apply additional parameters to the exporter. If the user submits a parameter that is not available for the file format this parameter is ignored.

          Parameters:
          fields - , available fields for the choosen file format
          exporter - , the exporter object
          parameter - , the parameters to apply

        • private void applyDefaultParameters(net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRExporter exporter, JasperExportFormat format)

          Apply the default parameters for a bunch of file format and only if useDefaultParameters is enabled.

          Parameters:
          exporter - , the JRExporter
          format - , the target file format

        • JasperReportDef buildReportDefinition(java.lang.Object parameters, java.lang.Object locale, java.lang.Object testModel)

          Build a JasperReportDef form a parameter map. This is used by the taglib.

          Parameters:
          parameters
          locale
          testModel
          Returns:
          reportDef

        • protected void forceTempFolder()

          Forces the Jasper Reports temp folder to be "~/.grails/.jasper" and ensures that such a folder exists. The user (however the app server is logged in) is much more likely to have read/write/delete rights here than the default location that Jasper Reports uses.

        • private net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRExporter generateExporter(JasperReportDef reportDef)

          Generate a exporter with for a JasperReportDef. Note that SUBREPORT_DIR an locale have default values.

          Parameters:
          reportDef
          Returns:
          JRExporter

        • private net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JasperPrint generatePrinter(JasperReportDef reportDef)

          Generate a JasperPrint object for a given report.

          Parameters:
          reportDefinition - , the report
          parameters - , additional parameters
          Returns:
          JasperPrint , jasperreport printer

        • @java.lang.Deprecated java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream generateReport(java.lang.String jasperReportDir, JasperExportFormat format, java.util.Collection reportData, java.util.Map parameters)

        • java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream generateReport(JasperReportDef reportDef)

          Generate a report based on a single jasper file.

          Parameters:
          format - , target format
          reportDef - , jasper report object return ByteArrayOutStreamByteArrayOutStream with the generated Report

        • java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream generateReport(java.util.List<JasperReportDef> reports)

          Generate a single report based on a list of jasper files.

          Parameters:
          format - , target format
          reports - , a List with report objects
          parameters - , additional parameters return ByteArrayOutStream with the generated Report
